sourcesContent:
const reviews = [
  {
    id: 1,
    name: 'Malina Syvoravong, Stylist and Recipe Developer',
    job: 'UI/UX, Webflow',
    image:
      'https://res.cloudinary.com/diqqf3eq2/image/upload/v1586883334/person-1_rfzshl.jpg',
    text:
      "Build and designed this website. We worked together to separate her large collection of photo projects, and narrowed down to two projects she really loved. I photo viewport is fixed for a fun viewer experience.",
  },
  {
    id: 2,
    name: 'Emily Chao, Bay Area Experimental Filmmaker',
    job: 'HTML, CSS, JavaScript',
    image:
      'https://res.cloudinary.com/diqqf3eq2/image/upload/v1586883409/person-2_np9x5l.jpg',
    text:
      'Built out this artist website. Emily requested the grid of photos display in a random order and developed the javascript code to support such a function. Had a lot of fun developing the menu options.',
  },
  {
    id: 3,
    name: 'Poetry Blog',
    job: 'HTML, CSS, JavaScript',
    image:
      'https://res.cloudinary.com/diqqf3eq2/image/upload/v1586883417/person-3_ipa0mj.jpg',
    text:
      'Hard coded a blog website for poetry inspiration.',
  },
  {
    id: 4,
    name: 'Muse Map',
    job: 'HTML, CSS, Bootstrap',
    image:
      'https://res.cloudinary.com/diqqf3eq2/image/upload/v1586883423/person-4_t9nxjt.jpg',
    text:
      'Built out a page for my phone app idea. At this time i was really seeking some outside inspiration, and ',
  },
  {
    id: 4,
    name: 'Jackie Katz, Political Theater Teacher',
    job: 'UI/UX, Webflow',
    image:
      'https://res.cloudinary.com/diqqf3eq2/image/upload/v1586883423/person-4_t9nxjt.jpg',
    text:
      'Jackie is a client of mine, she is a political drama teacher and she had a lot of ideas and ton of assets to send me.',
  },  {
      id: 4,
      name: 'Muse Map',
      job: 'HTML, CSS, Bootstrap',
      image:
        'https://res.cloudinary.com/diqqf3eq2/image/upload/v1586883423/person-4_t9nxjt.jpg',
      text:
        'Built out a page for my phone app idea. At this time i was really seeking some outside inspiration, and ',
    },  {
        id: 4,
        name: 'Muse Map',
        job: 'HTML, CSS, Bootstrap',
        image:
          'https://res.cloudinary.com/diqqf3eq2/image/upload/v1586883423/person-4_t9nxjt.jpg',
        text:
          'Built out a page for my phone app idea. At this time i was really seeking some outside inspiration, and ',
      },  {
          id: 4,
          name: 'Muse Map',
          job: 'HTML, CSS, Bootstrap',
          image:
            'https://res.cloudinary.com/diqqf3eq2/image/upload/v1586883423/person-4_t9nxjt.jpg',
          text:
            'Built out a page for my phone app idea. At this time i was really seeking some outside inspiration, and ',
        },
];
